c74object.name: lazyvst~
c74object.digest: A skeleton VST-like object with dynamic I/O support
c74object.description: The `lazyvst~` object is a VST host skeleton. It allows loading VST plugins via the `plug` message and can discover their input and output counts. While the number of ports on the object box is fixed at creation, the `@inputs` and `@outputs` attributes allow you to customize the object's I/O configuration.

outlet.description: Outputs diagnostic information when the log attribute is enabled.

method.name: plug
method.description: Accepts an absolute path to a VST plugin (DLL on Windows). Attempts to load the library, discover its I/O configuration, and logs the result.

method.name: repatch
method.description: Logs a suggested command to the Max console for recreating the object with the correct number of ports matching the currently loaded VST.

attribute.name: log
attribute.description: Enables verbose logging to the logging outlet.

attribute.name: inputs
attribute.description: Sets the number of signal inlets at creation (default 16).

attribute.name: outputs
attribute.description: Sets the number of signal outlets at creation (default 16).
